text: @WhiteHouse The Head of the WHO is not even a Doctor. But China got Tedros elected. Maybe so they open up their Super Labs without criticism from the WHO. The WHO has become a front for China's Coronavirus testing. It cost the world $ 20 trillion in economic losses. China should get the Bill
